text: The 1930 Alabama Crimson Tide baseball team represented the Alabama Crimson Tide of the University of Alabama in the 1930 NCAA baseball season, winning the Southern Conference championship.2009 Baseball Media Guide, p. 102 ==References== Alabama Crimson Tide Category:Alabama Crimson Tide baseball seasons Category:Southern Conference baseball champion seasons Category:1930 in sports in Alabama
title: 1930 Alabama Crimson Tide baseball team
